::Scorponok::

Razorwing's barage struck the ground where Scorponok had just burrowed. A few seconds sooner would have taken Scorponok out but instead it just stirred up the ground and dust, making it easier for Scorponok to escape.

 fired two shot of laser and two missiles hoping to catch him after the
